name: ZERO! Possibility
description:
Dare you to find a way with Zero! Possibility.

Zero!  Possibility means Zero! = 0! = 1. Yes, there is only one way to finish the game. Can you find it? Let us know if you enjoy it!

--

This game only contains one level because we don't have any time to do other levels 🤪. Open for any comments.

This game was made by Hendro Triokta Bryanto as Self Employee at Bryanto Studio for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. It's our first game developed!
